description_for_human: Primary sign language interface for AI agent transparency - not accessibility, but a visual reasoning layer
description_for_model: Sign language visual system that reflects agent state, intent, and confidence in real-time. Sign is authoritative, text is optional. Used for transparent AI agent communication.

sign_visual_state.description: Live visualization of agent state through sign language semantics

state_transparency.description: Shows what agent is doing, why it paused, what it needs

semantic_chunking.description: No word-for-word translation - semantic intent only

positioning.is: Primary interaction primitive for visual cognition

definition_of_done: Deaf user understands system state without reading text
No action happens without visible sign state
philosophy: If the system thinks, it signs. If it cannot sign, it should not act.
